SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest

Class MeasurementService

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.AbstractServiceImpl
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.MeasurementService
@Path("/measurements") @Component("measurementService") @Consumes("application/json") public class MeasurementService extends AbstractServiceImpl
RESTful web service for measurement data operations in OpenO EMR. This service provides secure, OAuth-authenticated access to measurement data for external integrations, mobile applications, and API consumers.

The service follows REST conventions and provides JSON-based endpoints for:

  • Data retrieval: Getting measurements by type, patient, and date ranges
  • Security enforcement: OAuth 1.0a authentication and authorization
  • Data transformation: Converting internal models to API-friendly formats
  • Type filtering: Selective measurement retrieval by clinical type

Security model:

  • All endpoints require OAuth 1.0a authentication
  • Users must have "_measurement" read privileges
  • Patient demographic access is validated per request
  • Audit logging tracks all API access

Data formats:

  • Input: JSON with measurement type arrays
  • Output: MeasurementResponse objects with measurement collections
  • All responses include metadata and status information

Example API usage:


 POST /ws/rs/measurements/{demographicNo}
 Content-Type: application/json
 
 {
   "types": ["BP", "WT", "HT"]
 }
Since:
2006

  • Method Details

    • getMeasurements

      @POST @Path("/{demographicNo}") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public MeasurementResponse getMeasurements(net.sf.json.JSONObject json, @PathParam("demographicNo") Integer demoId)
      Retrieves measurements of specified types for a patient via REST API. This endpoint accepts a JSON payload containing measurement type codes and returns matching measurement data for the specified patient.

      Request format:

      
 {
   "types": ["BP", "WT", "HT", "GLU"]
 }

      Security requirements:

      • Valid OAuth 1.0a authentication token
      • "_measurement" read privilege
      • Access to the specified patient's demographic data

      Response includes all measurements of the requested types for the patient, transformed into API-friendly format with metadata.

      Parameters:
      json - JSONObject containing array of measurement type codes to retrieve
      demoId - Integer the patient's demographic ID from the URL path
      Returns:
      MeasurementResponse containing matching measurements and metadata
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if user lacks required measurement read privileges
      See Also:
      • MeasurementResponse
      • MeasurementManager.getMeasurementByType(ca.openosp.openo.utility.LoggedInInfo, Integer, List)
